rows.label: qev070301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, er, [ST:playername ]...
You've been to Sylvalum, haven't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't suppose you've seen anybody who looked like
the boss there? Professor B, that is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0010
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Veven that you have not seen Professor B.

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Veven why he called Professor B "boss."

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I see. With all the traveling around you do,
I thought maybe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Er, but I should probably back up, right? The professor
ran off to Sylvalum to gather materials for for a new
product we're rolling out through Factory 1.21.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0005
rows.name:
He headed out there in the Miramobile, so he should
be able to return home literally as soon as he's done
acquiring those materials, if you follow me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0006
rows.name: But I haven't heard a thing from him since he he left...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0007
rows.name:
The professor started a new company called Factory
1.21 that sells weapons to BLADEs. I mean, he had to
do SOMETHING to to pay off that debt, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I work there now, and whenever I call him "Professor,"
he snaps at me, right? He keeps saying that the CEO
deserves to be called "boss," so I just...do it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Typical, right? When he started the company,
he was bellyaching about it nonstop, you know?
Now he fancies himself some kind of tycoon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0010
rows.name:
He took off for Sylvalum to gather materials for a new
product we're rolling out, and now I've pretty much lost
all contact with him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0011
rows.name:
He headed out there in the Miramobile, so it's not
like traveling back should take very long, you know?
Or any time at at all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0012
rows.name:
If he doesn't come back, Factory 1.21 will go under.
And then I'll never receive all the money he owes me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'll be left holding the bag on a small mountain of
debts, which means I'll be totally ruined![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'll just disappear into the void like the professor...
Mourned by no one... Ha ha...haaaaa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Veven, it wouldn't be fair to be the only one to survive
this nightmare, now would it? So come with me.
Come to a place beyond debts and liabilities...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0016
rows.name:
P-please try to calm down, okay, Graham?
We don't know anything about the professor for
certain...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0017
rows.name:
But he's gone silent! Did he run away to the future?
Who knows? Hell, who can EVER know?!
But wherever he went, it's all over for us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0018
rows.name:
What about you? Will you come with us as well?
There's nothing in this life to miss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Graham to sign you up.

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Graham that you have other things to do.

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Don't YOU go all crazy on me too, okay?!
What reason do you have to give up on life, anyway?
Let's all just just take a deep breath here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0020
rows.name:
And so do you, Graham! Life is chock full of fun things
to look forward to, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hey, so, [ST:playername ]?
Is there any way I can convince you to go look for the
professor out in Sylvalum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Factory 1.21's fate is on the line, you know?
So we won't skimp on the reward...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Do you mind? I'm less worried about the professor at
this point than I am about what Graham will do if if
he doesn't get back soon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Thank you. The Miramobile should be somewhere in
Sylvalum's North Cinderdunes, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0025
rows.name: Maybe you'll find some sign of Professor B nearby?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Regardless of wherever or WHENever he's run off to,
I need you to to drag him back here pronto, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0027
rows.name:
There are tons of things I still need the professor to
teach me, you know? Graham and I both need him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that Professor B is important to you, too.

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0060
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0061
rows.name: Warn Veven that it is possible the professor is dead.

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0028
rows.name:
For a nutty guy with the world's most suspicious
backstory, the professor is is awfully popular, isn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0029
rows.name: Weeeell, I suppose brutal realism has its place...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0030
rows.name:
But I just believe the professor wouldn't give up the
ghost that easily, okay? I think he's still alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0040
rows.name:
I'm counting on you to drag Professor B back from
Sylvalum, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0041
rows.name:
He still has volumes to to teach me, you know?
And honestly, I'm not sure Graham will make it if
the professor doesn't come home soon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Professor B told me what what happened...
About how that Gadd guy was keeping him prisoner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0043
rows.name:
"Thank you" doesn't really begin to cover it,
you know? If you hadn't gone after him,
who can say if if the professor would still be alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Veven! What have I said about calling me that?!
I'm founder, president, and CEO of Factory 1.21![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0045
rows.name: Y-yes, boss! Sorry, boss...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Yeeesh... Lately he's been so obsessed with running this
business, you know? Well, the making-money part of it,
anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0047
rows.name:
Remember how he used to go on about how science
was the pure and noble pursuit of a better future?
Talk about fickle, eh...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0091
rows.name: Sigh and agree that Professor B is hopeless.

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0101
rows.name: Explain that such things are part of Professor B's charm.

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0048
rows.name:
And after all the trouble he's dragged you through,
no one's more qualified to say that than you, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0049
rows.name:
Sometimes I wonder if maybe everyone in the future
is like him? Talk about bleak prospects...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0050
rows.name: After all the trouble he's dragged you into? Wow...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Still, I suppose I'm just as crazy?
I did sign up to work for him, after all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0052
rows.name:
In any case, here's your reward, all right?
Thank you for saving our company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0053
rows.name:
Get this, Veven! Graham here has sworn fealty to me
and joined our little Factory 1.21 family![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0054
rows.name:
What? NO! I just told you to hurry up and pay me
back as quickly as—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0055
rows.name:
Possible, yes, which clearly means you want the
company to grow and succeed and are eager to
help that happen in whatever way you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0056
rows.name:
Oh, you're just adorable, Graham. Lucky you, Veven!
You finally get an underling of your own![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0057
rows.name:
Oof... Graham's kind of a pushover, isn't he?
He'll probably be working here for life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0110
rows.name: Rescue

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0111
rows.name: Intervene on Graham's behalf.

rows.label: qev070301_JNK0120
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev070301_SEL0121
rows.name: Stand back and see what happens.

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0058
rows.name:
Hey, that's right!
There's no reason I should have to work he—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0059
rows.name:
Hey, don't just stand there and let me get railroaded!
There's no reason at all why I should have to work h—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0060
rows.name:
Enough whining! Now get over here so we can start
your employee orientation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0061
rows.name: Whaaat? Why?! This isn't FAIR![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0062
rows.name:
Well, the professor's a solid engineer, right?
At least you'll help make some excellent gear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070301_MSG0063
rows.name:
Maybe you'll let us help you out the next time you're in
need of equipment?[ST:wait ]
